Functions in the 'gc_data_storage' package.
- save_data_to_bucket()
- read_data_from_bucket()
- list_saved_data()
- copy_from_bucket_to_bucket()

Using the package

```
pip install gc_data_storage
from gc_data_storage import gc_data_storage as gs
gs = gs()

gs.list_saved_data()

```

For detailed information, including examples, see https://github.com/AymoneKouame/google-could-data-storage/.
